get.description: OpenAPI Document for eCards in json-schema draft 4

userAgent.description: Information about the eCards client extracted from the user-agent http request header

addressComponents.title: Address components
addressComponents.description: Address components, loosely based on address_components as defined as part of the Google Places API, see https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/geocoding/intro#Types.

countryCode2.description: NB: This property has no Google equivalent.

countryCode3.description: NB: This property has no Google equivalent.

streetName.description: NB: This property has no Google equivalent.

dataExchange.description: Current Data Exchange Endpoint url, see [Data Exchange](#/Data%20Exchange)

templatesSelections.description: Current Templates Selections Endpoint url, see [Templates Selections](#/Templates Selections)

serverTime.description: Server time in unix time in mili seconds.

balanceAndTransactionsGetFilterV1.description: Get Balance and Transactions request body

cardId.description: Card identifier as displayed on a physical card as text or as scannable code

symbology.description: Symbology used to present a scannable code on the eCard

name.description: Name to be displayed on the eCard.

objectId.title: Object id schema
objectId.description: The Object id is a MongoDB ObjectId.

style.title: Style schema
style.description: The style defines the eCard layout.

externalDocs.description: SDD #2 - eCard face and back images

httpResponseBody.description: HTTP 202: The request has been accepted but not processed, see body for more information.

projection.name: projection
projection.description: Projection parameter to reduce returned data.
